entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Javax.Net.Ssl.SSLHandshakeException: #19092
  • Disabling RefreshView disables the keyboard #19091
  • SecureStorage on Android: Request StrongBox Backed when building MasterKey for EncryptedSharedPreferences #19090
  • ListView Template with Group Headers Shows Wrong Data on Reuse after Scroll #19089
  • vs2022 .net8.0 mauiAPP can't run #19084
  • [iOS] RadioButton text related properties not working #19081
    Backlog
  • [Bug] Space in Common Class Project triggers some issue while MAUI Class Library is refer on it #19080
  • [Android] Default `CornerRadius` is being converted `ToPixels` twice on `Button` #19077
    Backlog
  • XAML Hot Reload not working for Brush type property in custom controls #19075
    Backlog
  • Shell's back behavior using GoToAsync("..") triggers no page transition for first detail page on iOS #19074
    Backlog
  • [UITEST] Investigate a way to reset the app under test for each test run with Appium #19073
    Backlog
  • [Android] Entry and KeyPress event on Enter key (hardware keyboard) #19072
    Backlog
  • Cannot open First Flyout Item on iOS devices once again #19071
    Backlog
  • Setting Shell.FlyoutWidth in code-behind on Windows throws ArgumentOutOfRangeException #19068
    Backlog

Closed

  • StringContent has no constructors defined #18610
  • CollectionView items height is all over the place when scrolling on iOS (.Net 8 + MAUI workload 8.0.0-rc.1.9171/8.0.100-rc.1) #17890
    .NET 8 SR1
  • How do we use Microsoft.Maui.Controls.WebView in the mobile application that wants to launch multiple browser tabs? #17063
  • [Android] Null check then tostring works differently #19082
  • anggi #19078
  • Soft Keyboard Input Mode doesn't work on .NET MAUI Blazor 8.0.3 (Android) #19066

PullRequests

Created

  • Save device logs when UI Tests fail #19085
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Revert "[Blazor] Fix static file handling so that it special cases modules.json (main)" #19079
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [tests] Fix WebView leak test #19076
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Windows] Fix setting flyout width (#19068) #19070
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨

Merged

  • [ios] update MemoryAnalyzers and cleanup #18449
    platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 SR1
  • Add nightly to the list of versions #19088
  • Prevent iOS CollectionView size shifts from clearing the cell size cache #19069
    area/collectionview 📃
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19067
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [testing] Run tests on device #17808
    area/testing

Updated

  • Fix for #11991 - CollectionView SelectedItem BackgroundColor is always Gray on iOS #17464
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Avoid possible crash using essentials Battery #18386
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/essentials 🍞
  • Add Android 14.0 or API 34 to the test matrix #18721
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Update ShellSectionRenderer.cs #18945
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • [Android] Correctly clear text tapping the clear button on Entry #17543
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, Under Consideration
  • Fix for button cornerradius 0 on android #18959
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [tests] Add runs on iOS17 #18962
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, .NET 8 SR1
  • Improves performance on BindableProperty #17756
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • Add benchmarking class for PropertyMapper extensions #18660
  • Removed vestigial UpdateContentLayout() method left over from Forms #18856
    area/layout 🔲
  • Added TimePicker TimeSelected Event #18565
    do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-datetimepicker
  • Allow GesturePlatformManager to be created for views with null window… #18938
    community ✨, area/gestures
  • Disallow `NaN`s in `Rect` sizes #18971
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨
  • iOS Keyboard Scrolling Improvements and UITests (not from fork) #17670
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, area/keyboard, Under Consideration
  • Add legacy ScrollView UITests #19054
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, layout-scrollview
  • [Android] Allow setting Button CornerRadius to 0 #19059
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Catalyst] Allow setting of MaximumTrackColor on Slider when using Mac Idiom #18990
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-slider
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test E1 #18624
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Android] Fix Enter key triggering ReturnCommand on Entry #18560
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D13 #18710
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures, .NET 8 SR2
  • [Android] Allow to scroll horizontal WebView content inside TabbedPage #14320
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, Under Consideration
  • [Testing] Add legacy CollectionView UITests #18979
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃, area/testing
  • [Testing] Fix flaky ShapeUpdatesBrushCorrectly test #19047
    area/drawing ✏️, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Bump the androidx group with 16 updates #18943
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
